name: Reddit - lose the white H between vote arrows
description:
This is a style to address the issue outlined here: http://www.reddit.com/r/reddit.com/comments/9bwa7/social_voting_experiment_if_you_vote_more/c0c6e63


Update: apparently user styles does not accept Data URIs as suggested in the comments, here is FillinTheBlank's ammended version if you wish to use URIs: http://www.reddit.com/r/reddit.com/comments/9bwa7/social_voting_experiment_if_you_vote_more/c0c6y3q
